text: Lyle Talbot (Lisle Henderson, February 8, 1902 â€“ March 2, 1996) was an American movie, television, stage, voice, radio actor. He was known for his television role as James Gordon in the Batman serials television series. He is known for his appearance in the movies Plan 9 from Outer Space, She Had to Say Yes, Glen or Glenda, Atom Man vs. Superman, and in Murder in the Clouds. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1902 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors Category:Actors from Pittsburgh
title: Lyle Talbot
